field.label: Version
field.description:
2.1.0
Download the latest release from https://github.com/Lyquix/tpl_lyquix/releases/latest

field.name: version_2.1.0
field.description:
• Several fixes for IE11, JavaScript, defer, etc.
  • Track JavaScript errors in Google Analytics
  • Enhancements to accordions, swipe, detect browser functionality
  • Simple hash function

field.name: version_2.0.0
field.description:
• Refactor CSS library to use SASS, provide control over what library components to load, and prevent loading styles that need to be overriden
  • Add support for CSS Grid and FlexBox
  • Standardize all elements to box-sizing: border-box
  • Eliminate blk structure by columns and use only fractions and percentages
  • Implement non-blocking styles loading
  • Remove unused CSS styles
  • Refactor JS library: break up into multiple files, resturcture to expose only select functions and variables, provide control over what library modules to load
  • Add new JS functionality: autoresize, string functions, test geographic point is withing region, accordions, tabs, menus
  • Standardize Vue as the default framework for web apps
  • Implement async script loading
  • Add polyfill.io to normalize browsers JS support
  • Remove unused JS functionality
  • Single template file for tmpl=default and tmpl=component
  • Block directory listing with .htaccess (and eliminate index.html files)
  • Merge (concatenate) CSS and JS files to improve browser performance
  • Automatically download ip2geo database
  • Streamline naming convention and folder structure
  • Remove unused font libraries
  • Remove unused Joomla overrides
  • Simplify module positions
  • Add shell scripts for processing CSS and JS files
